metadata.title: CVE-2018-19358 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: GNOME Keyring through 3.28.2 allows local users to retrieve login credentials via a Secret Service API call and the D-Bus interface if the keyring is unlocked, a similar issue to CVE-2008-7320. One perspective is that this occurs because available D-Bus protection mechanisms (involving the busconfig and policy XML elements) are not used.

notes.note: msalvatore> Upstream may say this is by design. See upstream FAQ.

criterions.comment: gnome-keyring package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
